title: Missed Prime Day? Snag Our Favorite Security Cam for Just $100 at Amazon Right Now
description: Prime Day came and went, but there are still plenty of remaining deals that can help you save, such as this 60% discount on an Arlo Pro 5S security cam.
author: Ingrid Cruz
excerpt: Prime Day came and went, but there are still plenty of remaining deals that can help you save, such as this 60% discount on an Arlo Pro 5S security cam.
text: If you didn't get a chance to shop during Amazon Prime Day, you're in luck. There are still plenty of splurge-worthy deals on essentials and tech — even home security cameras, which can make great utilitarian gifts if you have someone on your list who can be hard to shop for. If you or someone you know would like to keep a better eye on the home or small business, now's a great time to snag our top choice for the best home security camera, the Arlo Pro 5S, for only $100 at Amazon. That saves you 60% on the overall asking price of $250.The Arlo 5S Spotlight security camera features 2K HDR capture for great visuals all 24 hours of the day. It has color night vision, which allows you to see anything that happens outside at night, and it also turns on a spotlight should anything or anyone suspicious arrive within your home's purview. The included camera has 12x zoom and a 160-degree field of vision for a comprehensive look at your front yard or backyard. You can install it either indoors or outdoors depending on your security needs.Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money.The Arlo 5S includes a mount you can use to easily install your camera, and video object detection -- perfect for monitoring any package deliveries. This security camera supports dual-band Wi-Fi connectivity and detects 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks. Once you sync this camera to your Wi-Fi network, it'll connect to whichever band is stronger. Need an even more budget-friendly option? The Arlo Essential security camera 2K is just $60 right now, saving you a total of $40.If you missed Prime Day and are looking for essentials, tech and other upgrades but want to stick to your budget, check out our list of remaining deals under $25.CNET is always covering a wide array of deals on tech products and much more. Start with the hottest sales and discounts on the CNET Deals page, and sign up for the CNET Deals Text to get daily deals sent straight to your phone. Add the free CNET Shopping extension to your browser for real-time price comparisons and cash-back offers. And peruse our gift guide, which includes a full range of ideas for birthdays, anniversaries and more.
html:
If you didn't get a chance to shop during Amazon Prime Day, you're in luck. There are still plenty of splurge-worthy deals on essentials and tech — even home security cameras, which can make great utilitarian gifts if you have someone on your list who can be hard to shop for. If you or someone you know would like to keep a better eye on the home or small business, now's a great time to snag our top choice for the best home security camera, the Arlo Pro 5S, for only $100 at Amazon. That saves you 60% on the overall asking price of $250.

The Arlo 5S Spotlight security camera features 2K HDR capture for great visuals all 24 hours of the day. It has color night vision, which allows you to see anything that happens outside at night, and it also turns on a spotlight should anything or anyone suspicious arrive within your home's purview. The included camera has 12x zoom and a 160-degree field of vision for a comprehensive look at your front yard or backyard. You can install it either indoors or outdoors depending on your security needs.

Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money.

The Arlo 5S includes a mount you can use to easily install your camera, and video object detection -- perfect for monitoring any package deliveries. This security camera supports dual-band Wi-Fi connectivity and detects 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks. Once you sync this camera to your Wi-Fi network, it'll connect to whichever band is stronger. Need an even more budget-friendly option? The Arlo Essential security camera 2K is just $60 right now, saving you a total of $40.

If you missed Prime Day and are looking for essentials, tech and other upgrades but want to stick to your budget, check out our list of remaining deals under $25.

CNET is always covering a wide array of deals on tech products and much more. Start with the hottest sales and discounts on the CNET Deals page, and sign up for the CNET Deals Text to get daily deals sent straight to your phone. Add the free CNET Shopping extension to your browser for real-time price comparisons and cash-back offers. And peruse our gift guide, which includes a full range of ideas for birthdays, anniversaries and more.
